Modify major parameters table helper function

modify_major_params.Rd

A function that adds user friendly descriptions to the major parameters table

Usage

modify_major_params(
  major_parameters,
  idxs,
  group = "",
  op = "",
  from = "",
  to = ""
)

Arguments

major_parameters

Major paramters table

idxs

Relevant rows indexes

group

Parameter group

op

lavaan style operator

from

Variable from

to

Variable to

Value

Updated major parameters table
